Interests

I absolutely love to code, produce music and game development! I'm an avid gamer with a bit of experience developing games in Unity3D and Unreal Engine. I've participated in 12 annual Global Game Jams since 2010. The GGJ is a weekend long hackathon for game development, in which you develop games in 48 hours. I've contributed music/sfx, art, and programming towards several indie games!

During my downtime I enjoy exploring this beautiful state of California. I enjoy taking hikes, exploratory drives and taking in the beautiful scenery along the coastline. I also enjoy reading self-help or technology related books, listening to podcasts or testing out a new programming language in my free time.
